text: Abner, the Invisible Dog is a 2013 American comedy film directed by Fred Olen Ray and written by Pat Moran. It stars Daniel Zykov, Molly Morgen Lamont, David DeLuise, and David Chokachi. == Premise == As Chad is celebrating his thirteenth birthday, his dog Abner starts talking and becoming invisible. == Cast == {| class="wikitable" !Actor !Role |- |Daniel Zykov |Chad |- |Molly Morgen Lamont |Sophie |- |David DeLuise |Murdoch |- |David Chokachi |Denning |- |Ben Giroux |Kane |- |Robert R.
